law.text: All statutes, or laws in conflict or inconsistent with the provisions of KRS 418.040 to 418.090, are hereby repealed. It is intended that KRS 418.040 to 418.090 shall be valid to the fullest extent possible; and that the invalidity, if any, of any part or feature thereof, shall not affect or render the remainder of KRS 418.040 to 418.090 invalid, or inoperative.
law.history: Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. sec. 639a-12. -- Created 1922 Ky. Acts ch. 83, sec. 12.
